firstappearance: Bonded with Daniel Ketch (Ghost Rider #1, 1990), Noble in his human form (Ghost Rider #78, 1996)
knownrelatives: Magdelena (Wife, deceased), Dante Kale (brother deceased), Jennifer Kale, Naomi Kale, Daniel and Barbara Ketch, Johnny Blaze (descendants)
powers: The possessed the the "Penance Stare," which allowed him to attack his enemies the pain and despair of their innocent victims. He has been known to manipulate Hellfire as a very effective weapon, often use as very powerful force bolts of fire.
